addNetworks.title: Yongeza Iinethiwekhi kwiWallet
addNetworks.description: Cofa nayiphi na inethiwekhi ukuze uyongeze kwi-MetaMask, i-Rabby, okanye ezinye ii-wallet ze-Web3

addNetwork.alreadyPending: Isicelo sele silindile. Jonga i-wallet yakho.
addNetwork.error: Ayiphumelelanga ukongeza inethiwekhi. Nceda uyongeze ngesandla.

networkWarning.title: Inethiwekhi Engachanekanga
networkWarning.message: Ukuguqulwa kwetoken kufumaneka kuphela kwiKhonkco le-BSC. Nceda utshintshele kwi-BSC ukuze uguqule iitokeni zakho zakudala.

confirmModal.title: Qinisekisa Ukuguqulwa
confirmModal.warning: Uza kuguqula iitokeni zakho. Nceda ufundisise oku kulandelayo ngaphambi kokuba uqhubeke.
confirmModal.burnExplanation: Iitokeni zakho ze-{{legacySymbol}} ziza kutshiswa ngokusisigxina kwaye isixa esilinganayo seetokeni ze-{{newSymbol}} ziza kwenziwa kwi-wallet yakho. Oku akunakubuyiselwa umva.
confirmModal.positiveNote: icala elihle: I-{{newSymbol}} ayinarhafu kwaphela — akukho rhafu ye-10%+ kwintengiselwano nganye.

finalConfirmModal.title: Uqinisekile Nyani?
finalConfirmModal.message: Eli lithuba lakho lokugqibela lokurhoxisa. Nje ukuba uqinisekise, i-{{legacySymbol}} yakho iza kuguqulwa ibe yi-{{newSymbol}} kwaye ayinakubuyiselwa umva.

settings.title: Izicwangciso
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: Hlaziya i-URL ye-RPC esetyenziselwa ikhonkco ngalinye kwindawo ekhethiweyo.

banner.title: Umtsha apha?
banner.message: Funda nge-Freedom Bridge nendlela yokudlulisa iitokeni ze-TigerOG phakathi kwamakhonkco.
banner.note: Qaphela: Ukuguqulwa kwetoken kusisigxina kwaye akunakubuyiselwa umva.

hero.title: Khulula <1/> <2>Ii-Asethi</2> Zakho
hero.subtitle: Dlulisa iitokeni ze-TigerOG ngokungenamthungo kumakhonkco usebenzisa i-Axelar Interchain Token Service. Khuselekile, ikhawuleza, kwaye ayinarhafu.

features.title: Interchain Token Service
features.description: I-Freedom Bridge isebenzisa i-Axelar ITS ukunikezela ngamava okudibanisa angenamthungo, akhuselekileyo, kwaye angenarhafu kwi-blockchains ezi-{{count}}+.

stopDecay.title: Yeka Ukubola
stopDecay.description: Iitokeni zakudala zitshisa i-10-11% yexabiso lakho kuyo yonke into oyithengayo kunye nokuthengisa. Ukuguqula kwi-TigerOG kuyakunqanda oku kuphuma igazi ngoko nangoko, kugcina i-100% yamandla akho.

conversion.title: 1:1 Ukuguqulwa
conversion.description: Ukunikezelwa okupheleleyo akutshintshi. Iitokeni zigcinwe kwisivumelwano sokuguqula esikhuselekileyo, kwaye i-1:1 echanekileyo iyasetyenziswa. Akukho kutyala imali, akukho kuthotywa.

multichain.title: Amakhonkco Amaninzi
multichain.description: Thumela kanye, fikelela kuyo yonke indawo. I-asethi yakho iba yi-native interchain token kumakhonkco kuquka i-Ethereum, i-BNB Chain, i-Base, kunye nokunye.

security.title: Ukhuseleko lwe-Axelar
security.description: Inikwe amandla yi-decentralized network yee-validators ze-Axelar. I-ITS iqinisekisa ukuba iitokeni zakho zihanjiswa ngokukhuselekileyo kwaye ngokungaguquguqukiyo kuzo zonke iinethiwekhi eziqhagamshelweyo.

cta.title: Ulungele ukudibanisa?
cta.description: Joyina inguqu ye-interchain. Kuthatha ngaphantsi komzuzu ukuguqula iitokeni zakho kwaye uqalise ukudibanisa nge-Axelar.

buyTokens.title: Fumana Ii-Asethi
buyTokens.description: Awunazo iitokeni okwangoku? Thenga iitokeni zoqobo kwi-PancakeSwap, emva koko uziguqulele kwiinguqulelo ezintsha ze-multichain.

liveStats.title: Iinkcukacha zeToken
liveStats.description: Idatha yexesha loqobo evela kwi-blockchain ebonisa ubonelelo oluguquliweyo kunye nokunikezelwa kuwo onke amakhonkco axhaswayo.
liveStats.liquidityDescription: Amachibi okurhweba asebenzayo kuzo zonke ii-DEX

header.title: Amaxwebhu
header.subtitle: Funda indlela yokuguqula iitokeni zakudala kwaye udibanise amakhonkco.

whatIs.title: Yintoni iFreedom Bridge?
whatIs.content: I-Freedom Bridge yiprotocol ebekwe endaweni enye eyilelwe ukukhulula iitokeni zakudala kwiirhafu eziphezulu zentengiselwano kunye nemida yekhonkco elinye. Ngokuguqula iitokeni eziqhelekileyo zibe zii-asethi ezihambelanayo ne-interchain, abasebenzisi banokuhambisa ixabiso labo ngokukhululekileyo kwi-blockchains exhaswayo.
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Iitokeni zakudala zihlala zine-10%+ iirhafu. Iitokeni ze-TigerOG zine-0% yerhafu.
whatIs.omnichainDesc: Hambisa ii-asethi ngokukhawuleza phakathi kwe-{{count}}+ blockchains nge-Axelar.

howToConvert.title: Indlela Yokuguqula Iitokeni
howToConvert.step1: Qhagamshela iwallet yakho kwikhonkco lomthombo (umz. i-BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step4: Vuma isivumelwano sokuGuqula sokuchitha iitokeni zakho.
howToConvert.step5: Cofa Guqula ukufaka iitokeni zakho zakudala kwaye ufumane isixa esilinganayo se "TigerOG" iitokeni.
howToConvert.note: Qaphela: Ukuguqula kuthatha irhafu yentengiselwano yetoken yakudala (ngexesha lohlaziyo) ukuba itoken yakho ihlawulisa irhafu kotshintshiselwano. Nangona kunjalo, xa sele iguqulelwe kwi-TigerOG, lonke utshintshiselwano olulandelayo kunye neebhulorho zikhululekile kule rhafu.

supportedNetworks.title: Iinethiwekhi eziXhaswayo
supportedNetworks.content: I-Freedom Bridge ixhasa inkqubo ekhulayo ye-{{count}}+ blockchains, eyenza ukusebenzisana okungenamthungo kuwo wonke umhlaba we-EVM nge-Axelar.

xerc20.title: ii-Token ze-Interchain
xerc20.content: I-Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) ivumela iitokeni ukuba zisetyenziswe kumakhonkco amaninzi anedilesi engaguqukiyo kunye nolawulo lophononongo olumanyeneyo. I-Freedom Bridge isebenzisa i-ITS ukuqinisekisa ukuba i-TigerOG ihlala iyi-asethi esemthethweni naphi na apho idityaniswe khona.

axelar.title: Inethiwekhi ye-Axelar
axelar.content: Sisebenzisa i-Axelar njengoluhlu lwethu lokusebenzisana. I-Axelar yinethiwekhi ebekwe kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo eqhagamshela ii-blockchains ezahlukeneyo, evumela unxibelelwano olukhuselekileyo kunye nokutshintshelwa kwee-asethi. Imodeli yokhuseleko ye-Axelar ixhhomekeke kwiiseti zee-validators engadingi mvume, ezibonelela ngokhuseleko lwenqanaba eliphezulu kwiitokeni ze-interchain.

conversion.title: I-Logic yoGuqulo
conversion.content: Isivumelwano sokuGuqula sisetyenziswe kwi-BSC. Xa uguqula, iitokeni zakho zakudala zithunyelwa kwidilesi efileyo (zitshisiwe ngokusisigxina) kwaye ufumana i-TigerOG kumlinganiselo we-1:1. Le yinkqubo yendlela enye — iitokeni zakudala ziyatshatyalaliswa kwaye azinakuze zifunyanwe kwakhona.

security.title: Imodeli yoKhuseleko
security.content: Ukhuseleko lwakhiwe kuwo wonke umaleko weFreedom Bridge:
security.point1: I-Architecture yoGuqulo: Iitokeni zakudala zitshiswa ngokusisigxina ngezivumelwano ezihlakaniphileyo eziqinisekisiweyo, ezingenakutshintshwa.
security.point2: I-Axelar Validators: Imiyalezo enqamlezileyo iqinisekiswa yinetiwekhi ye-Axelar ebekwe kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo.
security.point3: Ubonelelo Olungaguqukiyo: I-ITS ilawula i-minting kunye ne-burning ukugcina ubonelelo olupheleleyo luhleli kuzo zonke iinethiwekhi.
security.point4: I-Logic ePhicothiweyo: Yakhiwe kwi-Axelar kunye ne-OpenZeppelin standard libraries.

supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Zonke iinombolo zobonelelo zinokuqinisekiswa ngokuzimeleyo kwi-chain:

tigerogSupply.title: Ukuqhekeka koBonelelo lwe-TigerOG
tigerogSupply.intro: I-TigerOG inobonelelo olusisigxina oluvelayo oluvela kwitoken ye-BNBTiger yoqobo. Ubalo lobonelelo luthathela ingqalelo zonke iitokeni ezitshisiweyo nezigcinwe ngokusisigxina.
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Iitokeni ezithunyelwe ku-0x000...dEaD zitshisiwe ngokusisigxina kwaye azinakuphinda zifunyanwe. Oku kuquka iitokeni ezitshiswe ngendlela yerhafu ye-BNBTiger yoqobo.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Isixa esincinci seetokeni sibambekile kwisivumelwano se-BNBTiger ngokwaso. Ezi tokeni azifikeleleki kwaye zisusiwe ngokufanelekileyo kubonelelo.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: I-PancakeSwap liquidity pool iqulethe iitokeni ze-BNBTiger ezidityaniswe ne-BNB. Xa iitokeni ze-LP zitshisiwe (zithunyelwe kwidilesi efileyo), iitokeni ezingezantsi kwi-pool zitshixiwe ngokusisigxina.
tigerogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: ii-Token ze-LP ezitshisiweyo: 86.18% yazo zonke iitokeni ze-LP
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ngoko ke, i-86.18% yeetokeni kwi-LP zitshixiwe ngokusisigxina
tigerogSupply.note: Qaphela: I-TigerOG igcina umlinganiselo we-1:1 ne-BNBTiger ngexesha lofuduko. Ubonelelo oluvelayo lwe-TigerOG luhambelana nobonelelo oluvelayo lwenyani lwe-BNBTiger emva kokubala zonke iitokeni ezitshisiweyo nezitshixiweyo.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Idatha yokuQalisa: Ezi nani zabalwa xa kwaqalwa. Itoken ye-BNBTiger yakudala isaqhubeka nokutshisa iitokeni kuthengiselwano ngalunye, ngoko ke ubonelelo lwenyani lusenokuba ngezantsi kancinci kunokuba kubonisiwe.

lionogSupply.title: Ukuqhekeka koBonelelo lwe-LionOG
lionogSupply.intro: I-LionOG inobonelelo olusisigxina oluvelayo oluvela kwitoken ye-BNBLion yoqobo. Ubalo lobonelelo luthathela ingqalelo zonke iitokeni ezitshisiweyo nezigcinwe ngokusisigxina.
lionogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Iitokeni ezithunyelwe ku-0x000...dEaD zitshisiwe ngokusisigxina kwaye azinakuphinda zifunyanwe. Oku kuquka iitokeni ezitshiswe ngendlela yerhafu ye-BNBLion yoqobo.
lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Isixa esincinci seetokeni sibambekile kwisivumelwano se-BNBLion ngokwaso. Ezi tokeni azifikeleleki kwaye zisusiwe ngokufanelekileyo kubonelelo.

lionogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: ii-Token ze-LP ezitshisiweyo: 99.98% yazo zonke iitokeni ze-LP
lionogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ngoko ke, i-99.98% yeetokeni kwi-LP zitshixiwe ngokusisigxina
lionogSupply.note: Qaphela: I-LionOG igcina umlinganiselo we-1:1 ne-BNBLion ngexesha lofuduko. Ubonelelo oluvelayo lwe-LionOG luhambelana nobonelelo oluvelayo lwenyani lwe-BNBLion emva kokubala zonke iitokeni ezitshisiweyo nezitshixiweyo.
lionogSupply.launchData: Idatha yokuQalisa: Ezi nani zabalwa xa kwaqalwa. Itoken ye-BNBLion yakudala isaqhubeka nokutshisa iitokeni kuthengiselwano ngalunye, ngoko ke ubonelelo lwenyani lusenokuba ngezantsi kancinci kunokuba kubonisiwe.

frogogSupply.title: Ukuqhekeka koBonelelo lwe-FrogOG
frogogSupply.intro: I-FrogOG inobonelelo olusisigxina oluvelayo oluvela kwitoken ye-BNBFrog yoqobo. Ubalo lobonelelo luthathela ingqalelo zonke iitokeni ezitshisiweyo nezigcinwe ngokusisigxina.
frogogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Iitokeni ezithunyelwe ku-0x000...dEaD zitshisiwe ngokusisigxina kwaye azinakuphinda zifunyanwe. Oku kuquka iitokeni ezitshiswe ngendlela yerhafu ye-BNBFrog yoqobo.
frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Isixa esincinci seetokeni sibambekile kwisivumelwano se-BNBFrog ngokwaso. Ezi tokeni azifikeleleki kwaye zisusiwe ngokufanelekileyo kubonelelo.

frogogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: ii-Token ze-LP ezitshisiweyo: 99.31% yazo zonke iitokeni ze-LP
frogogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ngoko ke, i-99.31% yeetokeni kwi-LP zitshixiwe ngokusisigxina
frogogSupply.note: Qaphela: I-FrogOG igcina umlinganiselo we-1:1 ne-BNBFrog ngexesha lofuduko. Ubonelelo oluvelayo lwe-FrogOG luhambelana nobonelelo oluvelayo lwenyani lwe-BNBFrog emva kokubala zonke iitokeni ezitshisiweyo nezitshixiweyo.
frogogSupply.launchData: Idatha yokuQalisa: Ezi nani zabalwa xa kwaqalwa. Itoken ye-BNBFrog yakudala isaqhubeka nokutshisa iitokeni kuthengiselwano ngalunye, ngoko ke ubonelelo lwenyani lusenokuba ngezantsi kancinci kunokuba kubonisiwe.

header.title: Izivumelwano eziHlakaniphileyo
header.subtitle: Iidilesi zokusasazwa ngokusemthethweni zeetokeni kunye neebhulorho kuwo wonke ummandla we-Freedom Bridge.

interchainTokens.title: ii-Token ze-Interchain
interchainTokens.description: Iitokeni ze-Interchain ezisasazwe nge-Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS). Ezi tokeni zigcina iidilesi ezifanayo kuzo zonke iinethiwekhi ezixhaswayo.

axelarNetwork.title: Inethiwekhi ye-Axelar
axelarNetwork.description: Iprotocol yomyalezo esisiseko ekhusela ukutshintshelwa kwee-cross-chain kwaye iqinisekisa ingqibelelo yedatha phakathi kwee-blockchains ezahlukeneyo.

conversionContracts.title: Izivumelwano zokuGuqula
conversionContracts.description: Zinoxanduva lokuguqula iitokeni zakudala zibe zii-asethi ze-interchain. Ezi zivumelwano ziphatha idiphozithi kunye ne-minting logic kwikhonkco lemvelaphi.

conversionContractsTable.title: Iidilesi zeSivumelwano zokuGuqula
conversionContractsTable.subtitle: Ezi zivumelwano kwi-BSC ziphatha ukuguqulwa ukusuka kwiitokeni zakudala ukuya kwiitokeni ze-interchain.

liquidityPools.title: Amachibi oBumanzi
liquidityPools.description: I-DEX liquidity pools apho unokurhweba iitokeni ze-OG kumakhonkco ahlukeneyo.

faq.title: Inkxaso ye-Freedom Bridge
faq.subtitle: Iimpendulo kwimibuzo eqhelekileyo malunga ne-TigerOG, ukudibanisa, kunye ne-Axelar.

cta.title: Usenemibuzo?
cta.description: Joyina uluntu lwethu kwi-Telegram okanye ujonge i-Wiki eneenkcukacha zeziKhokelo zobugcisa.

questions.a1: Ukuguqula iitokeni zakho zibe yi-TigerOG kususa irhafu yentengiselwano (ihlala i-10-12%) eyayanyaniswa netoken yakudala. Ikwakuvumela ukuba udibanise ezi tokeni kwezinye ii-blockchains ezifana ne-Ethereum, i-Base, kunye nokunye nge-Axelar, uvumela ukufikelela kwi-ecosystems entsha.
questions.a2: Ewe. Iprotocol isebenzisa isivumelwano sokuGuqula esikhuselekileyo kunye ne-Axelar's Interchain Token Service. Xa uguqula, i-BNBTiger yakho itshiswa ngokusisigxina kwaye ufumana i-TigerOG kumlinganiselo we-1:1. Inkqubo yokutshisa iqinisekisa ukuba ubonelelo lulonke lulawulwa kakuhle kuwo wonke amakhonkco.
questions.a3: I-Freedom Bridge ngokwayo ayihlawulisi mrhumo ngokuguqula. Uhlawula kuphela imirhumo yegesi ye-blockchain eqhelekileyo. Ukudibanisa phakathi kwamakhonkco kubandakanya umrhumo wegesi enqamlezileyo ohlawulwa ku-Axelar ukugubungela iindleko zokudlulisela.
questions.q4: Kwenzeka ntoni ukuba ndilahlekelwa ziitokeni zam?
questions.a4: ii-Token ze-TigerOG ziziphatha njengayo nayiphi na enye itoken ye-ERC20. Ukuba ulahlekelwa lufikelelo kwiwallet yakho, azinakubuyiselwa. Soloko ugcina izitshixo zakho zabucala kunye namabinzana okubuyisela ekhuselekile.
questions.q5: Ndingakwazi ukuguqulela iitokeni zam ze-TigerOG zibuyele kwi-BNBTiger?
questions.a5: Hayi. Ukuguqula luguqulelo lwendlela enye. Xa uguqulela i-BNBTiger kwi-TigerOG, iitokeni zakho ze-BNBTiger zitshiswa ngokusisigxina (zithunyelwe kwidilesi efileyo). Oku kungenxa yoyilo — i-TigerOG luguqulelo oluphuculweyo, olungenarhafu olujolise ekuthatheni indawo yetoken yakudala ngokupheleleyo.
questions.a6: Sixhasa amakhonkco amaninzi we-EVM nge-Axelar, kubandakanywa i-BNB Chain, i-Ethereum, i-Base, kunye nokunye. Jonga i-Wiki kuluhlu olupheleleyo lweenethiwekhi ezixhaswayo.
questions.a7:
Ixesha lokudibanisa lixhomekeke kwikhonkco olithumela UKUSUKA:

• I-Ethereum: 15-20 imizuzu (ifuna ukuqinisekiswa ngakumbi)
• I-BSC & Avalanche: 2-4 imizuzu (ikhawuleza kakhulu)
• I-Base, Linea, Polygon: 3-5 imizuzu

I-app ibonisa ixesha eliqikelelweyo ngaphambi kokuba udibanise.
questions.a8:
Itoken nganye ye-OG inobonelelo olusisigxina oluvelayo oluvela kwitoken yayo ye-BNB yoqobo, ukubala iitokeni ezitshisiweyo, iibhalansi zezivumelwano ezibambekileyo, kunye ne-LP etshixiweyo:

• I-TigerOG: ~3.66 iseptiliyoni (36.62% yoqobo)
• I-LionOG: ~3.83 iseptiliyoni (38.33% yoqobo)
• I-FrogOG: ~8.39 iseptiliyoni (83.86% yoqobo)

Bona i-Wiki ngokuchithwa kweenkcukacha.
questions.a9: Ukuyekisa isivumelwano kuya kususa amandla okuphuhlisa kunye nokongeza amakhonkco amatsha kwixesha elizayo. Nangona isivumelwano singayi kuyekiswa kwixesha elibonakalayo, iisignesha ezininzi ziyafuneka ukwenza naluphi na utshintsho. Kananjalo, akukho token okanye irhafu eyabelwe iqela.
questions.a10: Ukudibanisa amakhonkco kufuna ukusebenza kwe-mint/burn - iitokeni ziyatshiswa xa ziphuma kwikhonkco kwaye zenziwe xa zifika. Oku kugcina ubonelelo lulonke lungaguquki kuzo zonke iinethiwekhi. Ukwenziwa kulawulwa yi-multisig Safe wallet.
questions.q11: Ngaba i-TigerOG ishiya i-BNB Chain ye-Axelar?
questions.a11: Hayi. I-Axelar ayiyo-blockchain - yiprotocol yokudibanisa edibanisa amakhonkco kunye. I-BNB Chain ihlala ilikhonkco lemvelaphi apho uguqula khona iitokeni zakudala. I-Axelar ivumela nje iitokeni zakho ukuba zihambe phakathi kwe-BNB, i-Ethereum, i-Base, kunye nezinye iinethiwekhi ezixhaswayo.
questions.a12: Qinisekisa ukuba udibanise ikhonkco kunye nedilesi yetoken kwiwallet yakho. Ungazifumana zonke iidilesi zesivumelwano kwiphepha leZivumelwano. Iqela le-Tiger lisebenzisa i-Rabby wallet eyenza ukulawula amakhonkco amaninzi kube lula.
questions.q13: Kutheni ukudibanisa ukusuka kwi-Ethereum okanye i-Base kuthatha ixesha elide?
questions.a13: I-Ethereum ifuna ii-epochs ezimbini ngaphambi kokugqiba iitransaction zokhuseleko oluphezulu. Ekubeni i-Base ihlala kwi-Ethereum, ilifumana njengelifa eli lilibaziseko. Oku kubeka phambili ukhuseleko ngaphezu kwesantya - iitokeni zakho zikhuselekile, yiba nomonde.
questions.q14: Kwenzeka ntoni ukuba ndihlala kwitoken yam yoqobo kwaye ndingaguquli?
questions.a14: Akukho kukhawuleza ukuguqula. I-BNBTiger kunye ne-TigerOG ziya kuhlala zine-liquidity pools ezahlukeneyo, i-market caps, njalo njalo. Kodwa i-BNBTiger inorhafu ephezulu kwaye i-TigerOG ayinarhafu yokurhweba. Ekubeni iirhafu kwiyoqobo zingasetyenziswanga ukuxhasa iprojekthi, uphuhliso lwenziwa liqela le-CTO le-TigerOG. I-Freedom Bridge kunye ne-multi-chain yenzelwe kuphela i-TigerOG.
questions.q15: Ingaba kukho irhafu yokuguqula? Ingaba i-TigerOG inayo irhafu?
questions.a15: Hayi. Kubiza kuphela umrhumo wegesi eqhelekileyo ukuguqula nokurhweba. Akukho rhafu okanye imirhumo eyongezelelweyo, kwaye i-TigerOG sisivumelwano esingenarhafu.
questions.a16: Hayi okwangoku. Iqela alikaqokeleli imirhumo kunye neerhafu ukuze bakwazi ukuxhasa imali kwi-liquidity pools ezinkulu ngokwaneleyo. Ukuze ufumane i-TigerOG ngoku, kufuneka uthenge okanye ube sele unayo yoqobo kwaye uguqule. Nje ukuba unayo i-TigerOG, ayizukuthengiswa lula kude abatyali-mali beze ukongeza kwi-liquidity pool.
questions.q17: Kutheni i-market cap ye-TigerOG ibonakala inyukile?
questions.a17: Okukhona i-liquidity pool incinci, kokukhona naluphi na urhwebo oluncinci lwenziimpembelelo enkulu kwi-market cap ebonisiweyo. Oku kuza kulunga xa abatyali-mali beze kuba ngababoneleli be-liquidity.
questions.a18: I-Freedom Bridge ayikwenziwanga uphicotho olusemthethweni lomntu wesithathu. Nangona kunjalo, ikhowudi yesivumelwano somguquli isekelwe kwi-SHx converter eyakhiwe liqela le-Stronghold (ababephethe i-XRP kunye ne-Stellar abasanda kubonisa e-Davos). Isiseko sokudibanisa sinikwe amandla yi-Axelar, ewenze uphicotho lokhuseleko oluninzi.
questions.q19: I-Freedom Bridge ikhusela njani kwii-hacks okanye ukuxhaphaza?
questions.a19:
Amanyathelo amaninzi akhona:

• Umguquliubamba kuphela ubonelelo oluvelayo olufunekayo - akukho tokeni ezigqithisileyo ezinokuxhaphazwa
• Umguquliakanamvume yokwenza (mint)
• Yonke ikhowudi yesivumelwano iqinisekisiwe kwi-chain kwaye yimithombo evulekileyo
• Iimvume zetoken zikhuselwe kwi-Safe.global multisig wallet
• Ukudibanisa kusingathwa yisiseko esivavanyiweyo se-Axelar
questions.q20: Ingaba ukudibanisa akunakuguqulwa? Kwenzeka ntoni ukuba ukudluliselwa akuphumeleli?
questions.a20: Udluliselo lwebhulorho lwanqabile ukuba lubambeke ngenxa yegesi enganelanga okanye ukuxinana kwenethiwekhi. Ukuba oku kuyenzeka, ungawujonga umkhondo wentengiselwano yakho kwi-Axelarscan kwaye ungeze ngesandla igesi ukuyigqiba. I-Axelar ibonelela ngezixhobo zokubuyisela intengiselwano - awuzukulahlekelwa ziitokeni zakho.
questions.q21: Ziziphi iingozi ezinxulumene nokusebenzisa i-Freedom Bridge?
questions.a21: Njengayo nayiphi na iprotocol ye-DeFi, kukho iingozi ezibandakanyekayo kuquka umngcipheko wesivumelwano esihlakaniphileyo, umngcipheko webhulorho, kunye nokuguquguquka kwemarike. Sincoma ukwenza uphando lwakho (DYOR) kwaye usebenzise kuphela imali onokukwazi ukuyiphulukana nayo. Jonga inkcazo yethu yomthetho ngolwazi oluthe vetshe.
questions.q22: Ndingakwazi ukuguqula isivumelwano esitsha se-BNB Tiger Inu (Septemba 2025)?
questions.a22: Hayi. I-Freedom Bridge ixhasa itoken ye-BNB Tiger yoqobo/yakudala eyasungulwa kwiminyaka emininzi eyadlulayo - hayi isivumelwano esitsha esenziwe ngoSeptemba 2025. I-Freedom Bridge yakhelwe ukuthatha indawo koluntu (CTO) yeetokeni ze-Tiger, Lion, kunye ne-Frog zoqobo.
questions.a23: Ukongeza ubumanzi ngumsebenzi we-DeFi ophezulu onemingcipheko kubandakanya ukulahleka okwethutyana. Ukuba unamava okubonelela ngobumanzi kwii-DEX ezifana ne-PancakeSwap okanye i-Uniswap, inkqubo iyafana - bhanqa itoken ye-OG kunye ne-asethi yesiseko. Nolu uthotho oluhle lwemfundo malunga nobumanzi ukuba ufuna ukufunda ngakumbi: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oiylIHvwMik&list=PL_ujg_v1hZ5iGtiuhT8NkSMqEOaLAgmUu
questions.a24: Hayi. Akukho ndlela yokutsala i-rug. Akukho tokeni okanye irhafu eyabelwe iqela, kwaye asiqokeleli nayiphi na imirhumo yokudibanisa — ezo ziya ku-Axelar ngeendleko zokudlulisela. Iqela ngabanini njengawe, abakha oku ngeendleko zabo. I-wallet yeqela kuphela yi-wallet yokuthengisa kawonke-wonke ehlawulelwa yiminikelo yoluntu. I-multisig Safe wallet ilawula iimvume zesivumelwano ezifana nokunqumamisa ukuthumela kumakhonkco xa kukho imeko kaxakeka, kodwa ayinakufikelela okanye iphinde ithumele imali yomsebenzisi.

disclaimer.title: Inkcazo yaseMthethweni
disclaimer.subtitle: Nceda ufundisise le nkcazo ngaphambi kokusebenzisa i-Freedom Bridge.

noInvestmentAdvice.title: Akukho Ngcebiso yoTyalo-mali
noInvestmentAdvice.content: Ulwazi olunikezelwe kwi-Freedom Bridge aluquki ngcebiso yotyalo-mali, ingcebiso yemali, ingcebiso yokurhweba, okanye naluphi na olunye uhlobo lwengcebiso. Akufanele uphathe nawuphi na umxholo njengolo hlobo. I-Freedom Bridge ayincomi ukuba nayiphi na i-cryptocurrency kufuneka ithengwe, ithengiswe, okanye ibanjwe nguwe. Yenza ukukhuthala kwakho kwaye udibane nomcebisi wakho wezimali ngaphambi kokwenza naziphi na izigqibo zotyalo-mali.

risksOfUse.title: Imingcipheko yoSetyenziso
risksOfUse.content:
Iimarike ze-Cryptocurrency ziyaguquguquka kwaye azinakuqikelelwa. Ngokusebenzisa i-Freedom Bridge, uyavuma kwaye uyamkela ukuba:

• Izivumelwano ezihlakaniphileyo zinokuqulatha iibugs okanye ubuthathaka obunokukhokelela ekulahlekelweni yimali
• Iibhulorho ze-Cross-chain zithwele imingcipheko ekhoyo kubandakanya kodwa kungaphelelanga apho: ukusilela kwe-oracle, ukusebenzisana kwe-validator, kunye nokuxinana kwenethiwekhi
• Amaxabiso etoken anokutshintsha kakhulu kwaye unokulahlekelwa yinxalenye okanye lonke utyalo-mali lwakho
• Iitransaction kwiinethiwekhi ze-blockchain azinakubuyiselwa umva
• Imirhumo yenethiwekhi kunye neendleko zegesi zingaphaya kolawulo lwethu kwaye zinokwahluka kakhulu

noWarranties.title: Akukho Ziwaranti
noWarranties.content: I-Freedom Bridge ibonelelwa "njengoko injalo" kwaye "njengoko ifumaneka" ngaphandle kwazo naziphi na iwaranti zalo naluphi na uhlobo, nokuba kuchaziwe okanye kuchazwe. Asiqinisekisi ukuba inkonzo ayizukuphazamiseka, ikhuselekile, okanye ayinaziphene. Asenzi ziwaranti malunga nokuchaneka, ukuthembeka, okanye ukuphelela kwalo nakuphi na ulwazi olunikezelwe eqongeni.

limitationOfLiability.title: Umda woXanduva
limitationOfLiability.content: Ukuya kuthi ga kowona mlinganiselo uvunyelweyo ngumthetho, i-Freedom Bridge, abaphuhlisi bayo, abafak'izandla, kunye namahlakani ayayi kuba nabutyala ngawo nawuphi na umonakalo othe ngqo, ongathanga ngqo, wengozi, owodwa, owalandelayo, okanye owohlwayayo ovela okanye onxulumene nokusebenzisa kwakho iqonga, kubandakanya kodwa kungaphelelanga apho ilahleko yenzuzo, ukulahleka kwedatha, okanye ukulahleka kwe-asethi ye-cryptocurrency.

thirdPartyServices.title: IiNkonzo zeQela leSithathu
thirdPartyServices.content: I-Freedom Bridge idibanisa neenkonzo zeqela lesithathu kuquka i-Axelar Network yebhulorho enqamlezileyo. Asinaxanduva lwezenzo, umxholo, ulwazi, okanye idatha yala maqela esithathu. Ukusebenzisa kwakho iinkonzo zeqela lesithathu kuxhomekeke kwimigaqo kunye nemiqathango yabo.

regulatoryCompliance.title: Ukuthotyelwa koMthetho
regulatoryCompliance.content: Imigaqo ye-Cryptocurrency iyahluka ngokwegunya. Unoxanduva olunye lokuqinisekisa ukuba ukusebenzisa kwakho i-Freedom Bridge kuthobela yonke imithetho kunye nemigaqo ekhoyo kwigunya lakho. I-Freedom Bridge ayenzi naluphi na umelo malunga nokusemthethweni kweenkonzo kulo naliphi na igunya.

dyor.title: Yenza Uphando Lwakho (DYOR)
dyor.content: Soloko usenza uphando lwakho (DYOR) ngaphambi kokusebenzisana nayo nayiphi na iprotocol ye-DeFi. Qinisekisa iidilesi zesivumelwano, qonda ukusebenza kwayo nayiphi na itoken osebenzisana nayo, kwaye ungaze utyale imali engaphezulu kunaleyo unokukwazi ukuyiphulukana nayo.

disclaimer.acknowledgment: Ngokusebenzisa i-Freedom Bridge, uyavuma ukuba ufunde, waqonda, kwaye uyavuma ukubotshelelwa yile nkcazo.

disclaimerModal.title: Inkcazo eBalulekileyo
disclaimerModal.subtitle: Nceda ufundisise kwaye uvume ngaphambi kokuba uqhubeke.
disclaimerModal.noAdvice: I-Freedom Bridge ayinikezeli ngeengcebiso zotyalo-mali, ezemali, okanye zokurhweba. Utyalo-mali lwe-Cryptocurrency luyaguquguquka kwaye lunomngcipheko.
disclaimerModal.risks: Ngokusebenzisa eli qonga, uyavuma ukuba izivumelwano ezihlakaniphileyo zinokuqulatha ubuthathaka, iibhulorho ze-cross-chain zithwele imingcipheko ekhoyo, kwaye iitransaction azinakubuyiselwa umva.
disclaimerModal.dyor: Soloko usenza uphando lwakho (DYOR) kwaye usebenzise kuphela imali onokukwazi ukuyiphulukana nayo.

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: Ukutshintsha inethiwekhi akwenzekanga. Nceda utshintshe ngesandla kwiwallet yakho.
